UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial peptides from the skin of a Korean frog, Rana rugosa.
Literature.Author: Park JM, Jung JE, Lee BJ

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:1% Hemolysis=10 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:2% Hemolysis=100 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Micrococcus luteus ATCC 4698(MIC=2.5µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=10µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis KCTC 1021(MIC=10µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 10031(MIC=25µg/ml),Shigella dysenteriae ATCC 9752(MIC=25µg/ml),Pseudomonas putida(MIC=100µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=100µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=75µg/ml),Saccharomyces cerevisiae(MIC=200µg/ml),Candida albicans(MIC=200µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=200µg/ml),Proteus mirabilis ATCC 25933(MIC=>200µg/ml),Serratia marcescens(MIC=>200µg/ml)
